title: How to Make a Pallet Bed Frame

steps.headline: Get 2 sets of pallets, these are available at any recycling store.
steps.description: You can even buy these at any supermarket warehouses.

steps.headline: Sand the pallets.
steps.description: Although you want the rustic effect a little sanding will prevent you from getting splinters.

steps.headline: Paint primer on the pallet's surface.
steps.description:
Paint any color you prefer. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9f\/Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9f\/Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Join the two pallets together.
steps.description:
You can cut a small plank and nail them to the sides of the pallets so the two pallets are joined. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b4\/Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b4\/Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Add wheels on the corners of the pallets.
Get a mattress and sheets and enjoy your rustic bed.

tyn: Plank of wood to connect the pallets together
text:
Get 2 sets of pallets, these are available at any recycling store. You can even buy these at any supermarket warehouses. Sand the pallets. Although you want the rustic effect a little sanding will prevent you from getting splinters. Paint primer on the pallet's surface. Paint any color you prefer. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9f\/Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9f\/Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Join the two pallets together. sentences: Get 2 sets of pallets, these are available at any recycling store.
You can even buy these at any supermarket warehouses.
Although you want the rustic effect a little sanding will prevent you from getting splinters.
Paint primer on the pallet's surface.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9f\/Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9f\/Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-a-Pallet-Bed-Frame-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Join the two pallets together.
You can cut a small plank and nail them to the sides of the pallets so the two pallets are joined.
